pezkuwi-welcome-001.title: Welcome to Pezkuwi Wallet
pezkuwi-welcome-001.details:
The first blockchain wallet for Kurdistan.
Secure, fast, and decentralized.

pezkuwi-staking-001.title: Stake Your HEZ
pezkuwi-staking-001.details:
Earn rewards by staking your HEZ tokens.
Secure the network and earn up to 12% APY!

pezkuwi-hez-001.title: HEZ Token
pezkuwi-hez-001.details:
The native token of Pezkuwi blockchain.
Used for transactions, staking, and governance.

pezkuwi-pez-001.title: PEZ Token
pezkuwi-pez-001.details:
The utility token on Pezkuwi Asset Hub.
Trade, swap, and use in DApps.

pezkuwi-governance-001.title: Your Voice Matters
pezkuwi-governance-001.details:
Participate in governance decisions.
Vote on proposals and shape the future!

pezkuwi-community-001.title: Join Our Community
pezkuwi-community-001.details:
Connect with fellow Pezkuwi users.
Get support and stay updated!

pezkuwi-explorer-001.title: Pezkuwi Explorer
pezkuwi-explorer-001.details:
Track transactions and blocks.
Explore the Pezkuwi blockchain!

pezkuwi-newroz-001.title: Happy Newroz!
pezkuwi-newroz-001.details:
Celebrating Kurdish New Year.
Newroz Piroz Be!
